textBox.richText: Our last few days take us south to a place called San Clemente where the beach is people free and the water is perfectly blue. Body boarding and sun-baking was going well until someone got crabs! (to be more precise - bitten by one) Of course we can’t spend all our last days lazing around the water so we ventured to Disneyland. It was a fun experience but frustrating standing in queues all day. We went on a range of rides from the very sedate “Winnie the Pooh” to the raging waters of “Splash Mountain”. On the opposite end of the temperature scale we ventured to the Honda Centre for an ice-hockey match - Anaheim Ducks Vs Vancouver Canucks. It was a fierce match with the home team winning by 5 goals.
